label:
This is an email notification that is sent to the user of when someone mentions him in the comments of post.
You can insert the following dynamic values:

##TaggedBy## - Name of the user that tagged another user
##FullName## - Name of the user tagged
##Url## - Link to the comment

template.subject: User tagging notification
template.body: ##TaggedBy## has mentioned you in comments to post: ##Url##
